snippet: Chicago’s victory, which ended an eight-game skid, came two innings after the White Sox scored five runs in the 14th, only to have Seattle tie it on Kyle Seager’s grand slam.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago White Sox defeat Seattle Mariners, 7-5, in 16 innings, snapping an eight-game losing streak; other MLB scores and news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and STEVE EDER

lead_paragraph: Chicago’s victory, which ended an eight-game skid, came two innings after the White Sox scored five runs in the 14th, only to have Seattle tie it on Kyle Seager’s grand slam.

headline.seo: White Sox Beat Mariners in 16 Innings After a Wild 14th
headline.main: White Sox Win in 16 After a Wild 14th
headline.print_headline: White Sox Win in 16 After a Wild 14th
